document_data.mainbody:
Garlena, or Sister Garlena, was a cleric of Helm at Watchers Keep in Amn.
The god Helm gave Garlena and her fellow knights the task of sealing Demogorgon inside the keep. Knowing it was a difficult mission, her leader, Odren, recruited Gorions Ward to work for him. Garlena helped Gorions Ward get equipped to enter the keep.
